comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content:
Top save your squinting:

"Original drawings, watercolors, etc.

"LETTERS HOME

"Stamps and cancellations verify dates.

"All items done in my room at "Desert Rat" Hotel Officers Quarters (at) Muroc, North Base. I was arrested by armed MP's for doing these but I had already check(ed) release dates on the items and was released (quite a 'hairy' event at the time). I guess they thought they had captured a Number 1 spy instead of a hard working Field Service Engineer.

"All this material was done at the scene as noted."
